kreport.name: itsystemQueryStat

condition.name: systemtype
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='(IT制度)制度类型' order by d.ordernum

condition.name: systemproperty
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='(IT制度)制度属性' order by d.ordernum

data.thead: 序号 工单编号 制度标准名称 制度类型 制度属性 提交人 提交单位 提交时间
data.tbody: ${0} ${工单编号} ${制度标准名称} ${制度类型} ${制度属性} ${提交人} ${提交单位} ${提交时间}

kreport.ksql:
--综合查询 select * from ( select distinct f.serialno 工单编号, f.title 制度标准名称, rend(e.systemtype) 制度类型, rend(e.systemproperty) 制度属性, u.user_name 提交人,getdepnamepath(uo.org_id) 提交单位, to_char(f.gendate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 提交时间, f.flowlsh,f.gendate from rec_flow f,sec_user u,sec_r_user_org uo,flw_flow fw ,ins_frm_itsystem e where f.flowlsh=e.flowlsh and u.id=f.startercode and u.id=uo.user_id and f.status!='XJ' and fw.flowcode=f.flowcode #[and f.title like ${title}] #[and e.scheme like ${scheme}] #[and e.systemtype=${systemtype}] #[and e.systemproperty=${systemproperty}] #[and (f.STARTERCODE in (${order_dept}) or uo.org_id in (select ID from SEC_ORG so start with so.ID in (${order_dept}) connect by prior so.ID=so.PARENT_ID)) ] #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate< ${endDate}]
) yb order by yb.gendate desc
